Bio: Quinton de Kock's fearless striking  hy glovework have earned him comparisons to greats of the game like Adam Gilchrist  Mark Boucher,de Kock shared the record for the most successive ODI centuries - three - before it was bettered by Kumar Sangakkara,he had established himself in all three formats
